screen_name: Planning a group outing to the gym on may 8th once COVID is dead. I’m talking 10 guys — sweaty, but also sneezing — within 3 feet of each other, just having a blast. It will be great and safe since COVID will be dead

I am a 21-year old who has tested positive for COVID-19. 

I was not going to share my story, but now that I see others are reporting very different symptoms than mine I feel it’s important to tell everyone my experience.
